Title: Le sourd dans la ville
Writer: Marie-Claire Blais (novel), Mireille Dansereau, Michèle Mailhot, Jean-Joseph Tremblay
Actors: Yves Allaire, Marie Charlebois, Samuel Cholakian, Angèle Coutu
Plot: A middle-aged woman is abandoned by her wealthy husband and moves into a cheap, dilapidated hotel where she develops relationships with the eternally optimistic owner and her deaf and terminally ill child.
